oracle.apps.saf.ta.test
Class AbstractAuditTest

java.lang.Object
  oracle.apps.saf.ta.test.AbstractAuditTest

public class AbstractAuditTest
extends java.lang.Object

SAF base class for JUnit tests for JAudit. This class provides functionality for exectuting JUnit tests for JAudits. By design, this class allows you to audit a node or nodes under a specific Workspace and Project. It is not designed to test across Workspace or across Projects.
The method setProjectType(ProjectType)is provided to allow a test project to be entered even if its not detected as the correct typeInTest.

See Also:
JspNodeUxAnalyzerTest.java for a detailed test example.

public AbstractAuditTest(java.lang.Class analyzer,

Contructs the test. The provided paths will be asserted to exist.

Parameters:
analyzer - The analyzer class under test.
workspace - The ADE_VIEW_ROOT relative .jws path.

createAuditFixture

protected SafAuditTestFixture createAuditFixture(java.lang.String ruleId,
                                                 java.lang.String... nodePaths)
Convenience method to create a SafAuditTestFixture. The fixture is the primary vehicle for executing the audit by the subclass. After obtaining the fixture the subclass typically invokes the audit method and asserts against the returned violations.

Parameters:
ruleId - Audit rule under test
nodePaths - ADE_VIEW_ROOT relative file paths to audit.
Returns:
A new valid fixture.

initProjectType

public static void initProjectType()

isJUnit

public static boolean isJUnit()
The AbstractAnalyzer.exit(Workspaces) method clears cached framework data. This is not desired when running JUnit tests as its non-performant. This flag prevents that during JUnit execution.

Returns:
True is a JUnit test is running.

setProjectType

protected void setProjectType(oracle.apps.ta.dt.core.model.facades.ProjectType type)
Convenience method to force a ProjectType via injection to all the analyzer to enter the given Project.

Parameters:
type -

testTransform

protected void testTransform(java.lang.String nodePath,
                             SafAuditTestFixture testAuditor,
                             java.util.List<oracle.jdeveloper.audit.service.Violation> violations,
                             java.lang.String transformName)
Tests JAudit Transforms. This method will execute the transform for a violation and then re-audit the violation, asserting that the violation has been fixed. After the testing, the transformed test file will be restored to its original state.

Parameters:
nodePath - ADE_VIEW_ROOT relative file path being tested.
testAuditor -
violations - The violations dectected.
transformName - The transform name to execute.
